string.value: #p2101008#, the older sister of #p2101001#. #p2101001# will want to know how his sister is doing. You should deliver the letter she wrote to #b#p2101001##k.
#p2101001# seemed ecstatic to receive a letter from #p2101008#. He must have been concerned that the horrendous queen might really give her a hard time.
Hello, traveler. What kind of a story would you like to hear from me, #p2101008#? \r\n#L0# #b The story of #p2101001#

#p2101001#!? You know #p2101001#?! How is he?! I hope he's doing all right without me... So, #p2101001# sent you. Thank you. There's no way for me to check up on #p2101001# from the palace. I was so worried.\r\n#L0# #b #p2101001# is really worried about you, too.
I see... It's only natural, since he can't contact his only sister. Could you tell #p2101001# that I'm doing all right in here?
Thank you so much. Here's a letter I wrote. Please give it to #b#p2101001. I can't see him face to face, but I want to let him know that I am okay and that I miss him terribly.
You must be really busy... But there's nothing I can do from here. At least I know how #p2101001#'s doing now, but...
Hello, traveler. Did you see my sister? What? This is a letter from her?! I was so worried, because I heard that the queen is quite scary... I am so glad she's doing all right!
Can you please wait while I read her letter? Thanks.
I don't think you've met with #b#p2101001##k yet. He should be around #b#m260000200##k.
You didn't meet with my sister yet? She's in the palace.
Oh no... you lost the letter? Well, it's not hard for me to write another one. Here you go. Please give this to #b#p2101001##k.
